faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about एटीएम फ्रँचायझी

investment.question: What is the minimum गुंतवणूक required?
investment.answer: The minimum गुंतवणूक starts from ₹2 lakhs for a basic franchise model with 1-2 ATMs.

returns.question: What kind of returns can I expect?
returns.answer: You can expect 15-25% annual returns depending on location and transaction volume.

support.question: What support do you provide?
support.answer: We provide complete support including site निवडाion, installation, maintenance, cash management, and 24/7 technical assistance.

experience.question: Do I need prior experience?
experience.answer: नाही prior experience is required. We provide comprehensive training and ongoing support.

locations.question: Can I choose my एटीएम locations?
locations.answer: होय, you can suggest locations. Our team will help evaluate and finalize the best spots for maximum returns.

contract.question: What is the contract duration?
contract.answer: The standard फ्रँचायझी agreement is for 5 years with an option to renew.
